1: O God, hear my cry for help! Pay attention to my prayer!
2: From the most remote place on earth I call out to you in my despair. Lead me up to an inaccessible rocky summit!
3: Indeed, you are my shelter, a strong tower that protects me from the enemy.
4: I will be a permanent guest in your home; I will find shelter in the protection of your wings. (Selah)
5: For you, O God, hear my vows; you grant me the reward that belongs to your loyal followers.
6: Give the king long life! Make his lifetime span several generations!
7: May he reign forever before God! Decree that your loyal love and faithfulness should protect him.
8: Then I will sing praises to your name continually, as I fulfill my vows day after day.
